people.name: Lynne Spears
people.description: Lynne Irene Spears  is an American author and mother of film and television producer, Bryan Spears, pop singer, Britney Spears, and country singer, Jamie-Lynn Spears.

people.name: Hilary Duff
people.description: Hilary Erhard Duff  is an American actress and singer.

people.name: Ray Kay
people.description: Ray Kay  is a Norwegian director and photographer who is currently based in Los Angeles.

people.name: Barbara Martin
people.description: Barbara Diane Martin Richardson  is an African-American singer; better known for being one of the original members of Motown singing group The Supremes.

people.name: Cindy Birdsong
people.description: Cynthia Ann "Cindy" Birdsong  is an American singer who was formerly a member of Patti LaBelle & the Bluebelles, but is most famous for replacing Florence Ballard as a member of The Supremes.

people.name: Marcella Araica
people.description: Marcella Araica is an American recording and mixing engineer, who has recorded and mixed tracks for artists including Britney Spears, K Michelle Madonna, Pink, Duran Duran and Keri Hilson.

people.name: Carmit Bachar
people.description: Carmit Bachar  is an American singer, dancer, model, actress and showgirl.
